title: Death timers table?
body:
Whats the specifics on death timers, is it specific to the champions level or the duration of the game? And also what level/duration does each timer go up, and by how much?
When i look at post game stats, sometimes ill notice X player has spent almost double the time spent dead than Y player, yet Y player has died several times more than X player. I am just curious to know what the specifics of the timers are?

replies.body: The longer the game goes the longer the death timers will be, I don't know the exact math but I think it's 1 second per minute of the game

Perfect. Thanks Star!

Trivial FYI, it's "Sloth", not "Slouth" xD

Hey Slouth,

There is some method to the madness. Death timers contains several different factors (level, specific game time etc).

I'll post a link at the bottom of this post that specifically gives you the formula, but basically your death timer is:

Level x 2.5 + 7.5 = Base Respawn Timer (BRT)

The reason it's a 'base' timer, is because the timer is modified based on the game time. This starts at 15 minutes and increases incrementally every 30 seconds thereafter. 

So say you die 3 times at level 1, that would only be 30 seconds 3x[level 1 x 2.5 + 7.5].

However someone dying at minute 53.5 (the cap for incremental Respawn timers) would have a Respawn timer of:

(Level 18 x 2.5 + 7.5) x 1.5 = just over 78 seconds. 

Now don't go quoting me on this math, but I hope this gave you a general idea of death timers! :) 

Here's the link I promised: http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Death
